greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Odd multiplicative orders of 2 modulo primes.
comment: Subsequence of A014664, consisting of odd elements.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = multiplicative order of 2 modulo A014663(n).
mathematica: p = Select[Range[1000], PrimeQ]; Select[MultiplicativeOrder[2, #] & /@ p, OddQ] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Jul 30 2020 *)
results.author: _Max Alekseyev_, Apr 29 2008
